title: Client freezes for over a whole minute after someone leaves champ select...
body:
This is the new patch I'm on, Im in low spec mode, and where it took max 4 seconds (I'm running on a Mac) for the client to be "active" so I could respond to the accept queue button amongst the 10 seconds given (I'm very forgiving knowing you guys are squashing out the bugs):

"My client now freezes regularly for a whole min this patch (has never happened before, or ever) when someone dodges. I don't want to face leavebuster, or face an issue that is out of my hands. I really wish to address this issue, as I know others may/will be having this problem as well"

-Rico

replies.body: Are you experiencing this in both Clients or only in the Beta Client? Can you swap over to the other one and test this out for me? I'm interested to hear what you find.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=u1wB3PyA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-24T00:34:40.602+0000)
>
> Are you experiencing this in both Clients or only in the Beta Client? Can you swap over to the other one and test this out for me? I'm interested to hear what you find.

Will do. I'll report this shortly...additionally as to my current knowledge (prior to testing this on the legacy client) its happening continually in the new client.

> [{quoted}](name=Ricos OG Shyvana,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=u1wB3PyA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-24T21:23:59.646+0000)
>
> Will do. I'll report this shortly...additionally as to my current knowledge (prior to testing this on the legacy client) its happening continually in the new client.

After testing, a bit more processing is used on my computer in contrast to the beta client, but the legacy still has a smooth performance, hence the bug or lag is only in the beta client. I guess I'll use legacy till this issue is resolved...

Yeah, using the Legacy Client for now, would also be my suggestion. There's also a *Low spec mode* and a way to disable animation in the new client that has resolved performance issues for some players while causing no change for others. It would be worth a try at least once:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Yes I am also having this issue. I was worried it was just me xD Happy to see its not. (was worried something was wrong with my pc.

I am also experiencing this problem. I use the beta client on a Windows computer, and every time someone leaves champion select, my client freezes from about 30 seconds up to a minute. I keep declining the immediate ready check afterwards because I can't click accept.
